name: This is my Lord
description:
Follow the story of Prophet Ibraheem (alayhi salaam) as he calls his people to submit to Allah alone. He did not worship the stars, the moon, or the sun, but he worshipped Allah, alone. Read and listen to the message he gave his people, as recorded directly in the pages of the Qur'an.

  • Experience his story, as told in the pages of the Qur'an!
  • Listen and follow along with child-friendly audio!
  • Over 15 pages of content!

This is my Lord is safe for kids. We believe in making games that are a safe digital environment for kids. Our apps don't have any ads, in-app purchases, social media integration, or links outside the app. Our apps don't collect any personal data or require any special permissions to run.
